A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (spoilers) This movie was pretty good. I don't know why people hate it. Are they mad because Luke dies? It's not as good as The Force Awakens\, but has some exciting moments. Luke's illusion at the end was epic\, and the escape from Canto Bight was dope. Adam Driver is lame and awkward. The Asian girl is not as bad as everyone says. I think they got mad because she took Finn away from Rey.
